title: Spectral classification using convolutional neural networks
excerpt: Abstract: There is a great need for accurate and autonomous spectral classification methods in astrophysics. This thesis is about training a convolutional neural network (ConvNet) to recognize an object class (quasar, star or galaxy) from one-dimension spectra only.  ...

title: Methodologies for Cross-Domain Data Fusion: An Overview
excerpt: Abstract—Traditional data mining usually deals with data from a single domain. In the big data era, we face a diversity of datasets from different sources in different domains. These datasets consist of multiple modalities, each of which has a different representation,  ...
